column2: many wonderful things about this restaurant.  The food was fantastic.  I had the pork belly pancake
column3: loved it!  The bacon and toffee milkshake is amazing.  There's so many interesting combinations and fun choices on the menu
column4: the kind of place where you want to keep coming back so you can try everything.  Even the kids menu pancakes were delicious
column5: my son scarfed them up.  The beer list is respectable
column6: but I think a little bit snobby with the glassware and smaller sizes for the same price as a pint.
